actionable_feedback: Explicitly mention 'Big Data Frameworks' under the skills section.
Add specific projects where you used 'Machine Learning' techniques on large datasets.
Include your experience with 'SQL' and 'NoSQL' databases in the skills section.
Detail your experience with 'Cloud Platforms' like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud in your projects or experience section.
Specify your proficiency level (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced) for each skill.
Highlight experience with 'Data Pipelines' and 'Data Storage' optimization in your experience section.
Elaborate on your experience with 'Statistical Modeling' and 'Predictive Models' in projects.
Quantify the results of your data analysis projects with metrics.
Incorporate keywords such as 'Hadoop', 'Spark', or 'Kafka' if you have any experience with them, even if basic.
Add a section detailing familiarity with 'MLOps' and 'Model Monitoring' techniques, if applicable.

Big Data Frameworks.description: Learn to apply tools like Hadoop, Spark, and MapReduce to manage and analyze large datasets.

Big Data Frameworks.course_name: Apache Spark with Scala - Hands On with Big Data!
Big Data Frameworks.description: Master Spark and Scala to process big data efficiently. Includes real-world examples and hands-on projects.

Big Data Frameworks.course_name: Big Data Analysis with Scala and Spark
Big Data Frameworks.description: Covers the fundamentals of distributed data processing using Scala and Spark, suitable for data professionals.

Cloud Platforms.description: Understand basic AWS cloud concepts, services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.
Learn the basics of Azure cloud services, including compute, storage, networking, and security.

Cloud Platforms.course_name: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure
Cloud Platforms.description: Explore Google Cloud Platform's core infrastructure services, including computing, storage, and networking.

Deep Learning Frameworks.description: Master deep learning concepts, neural networks, and build models with TensorFlow and Python.

Deep Learning Frameworks.course_name: PyTorch for Deep Learning with Python
Deep Learning Frameworks.description: Learn PyTorch for deep learning and build models using image classification, GANs, and more.
Learn to use TensorFlow to build scalable AI-powered applications. Covers practical deep learning implementations.

Deploying Machine Learning Models.course_name: Machine Learning Engineering for Production (MLOps) Specialization
Deploying Machine Learning Models.description: Learn to deploy, monitor, and manage machine learning models in production environments.

Deploying Machine Learning Models.course_name: MLOps: Continuous Delivery and Automation Pipelines in Machine Learning
Deploying Machine Learning Models.description: Set up an automated machine learning pipeline with continuous integration and continuous deployment.
Learn how to deploy machine learning models in simple manner with example.
